description: Template for bug fix development sessions

session_info.context: How was the bug discovered? Include reproduction steps
session_info.impact: What is the impact and severity of this bug?

analysis.root_cause: What was the root cause of the bug?
analysis.investigation: What investigation steps were taken to identify the cause?

technical.approach: Describe your fix approach and why this solution was chosen
technical.decisions: What alternative fixes were considered and why were they rejected?
technical.side_effects: Any potential side effects or regressions to watch for?

implementation.files_changed: List all files modified and the specific changes made
implementation.backwards_compatibility: Does this fix maintain backwards compatibility?
implementation.testing: How was the fix tested? Include regression testing

validation.reproduction: Steps to reproduce the original bug
validation.verification: Steps to verify the fix works correctly
validation.edge_cases: Edge cases tested to ensure robustness

prevention.monitoring: Monitoring or alerting added to prevent future occurrences?
prevention.process: Process improvements to prevent similar bugs?
